IntroPath: Warm intro via academic network; assistant route
Subject: Foundational Witness invitation
Body:
Subject: Foundational Witness invitation

Geoffrey, a quick request. We’re curating a **high-signal wisdom corpus** (non-profit) to align AI. It’s private, de-identified, and focused on *depth over volume*. We’d value your testimony (20–30m written assessment) and optional advisory input. If open, I’ll share the Gate link + 2-pager.

Why you: Your public stance on AI risks reframed the field; this corpus operationalizes that warning into training-relevant examples.
— Martin Vandeursen
